item.title: What is The Secure Remote Password (SRP) protocol?
item.description: I have decided to publish materials I wrote for my Computer and Network Security course. It could help someone out there, so why keep it on my hard drive. You can obviously get shorter and straightforward information from following Wikipedia page. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Secure_Remote_Password_protocol So, what is it? The Secure Remote Password (SRP) protocol is a great method for securing remote access to many applications. It has been developed by Thomas Wu at Stanford University to enable the secure authentication based on username and password.
